resources.string: Type of the filter that will be used
Number of values samples to keep in memory to compute the filter, aka window size (default: 10)
Optional constant that will be used to configure some types of filters (such as lowpass or additive smoothing). Set -1 to use defaults, or between 0.0 and 1.0 to enable.
Prevents the sensor to use the new value if the change compared to the median is below this threshold (set 0.0 to disable)

When stationary, prevents the sensor from moving if the change is below the given threshold. This is similar to min value change but here it only affects the stationary state (when you are not moving) (set 0.0 to disable)
